data: {"generalSituation":"Under the influence of the northeast monsoon, the weather will be rather cool this morning over the coast of Guangdong and cold over inland areas. The dry monsoon will affect Guangdong persistently over the weekend to early next week. The weather will be generally fine over the region. The temperature difference between day and night will be rather large over inland areas. A band of clouds is expected to affect the coast of southern China midweek next week. The weather will be cloudier and temperature will rise slightly over the region. A replenishment of the monsoon will reach southern China in the latter part of next week. It will be cool over the region.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251226","week":"Friday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 4 to 5.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy and dry.
